name: Escape If You Can: Island Escape challenge games
name_original: Escape If You Can: Island Escape challenge games
description:
Are you ready for the most uncommon room escape game you have every played?

The newspaper reported that a child was inexplicably missing on the island, and as an experienced detective, you felt something was strange and decided to go to the island to rescue the child. This day, you came to the vicinity of the island, what will happen to the adventure ... ...

Magnificent puzzles,Stunning story
Beautifully rendered backgrounds that will pull you in and never let you go!
Beautiful soundtrack perfectly suited to this eerie and haunting world.
Auto-save feature , never lose your progress again.
